review:
it's  a phyco movie. it shows the mental status of director towards a lady. suppos a women was in relation with a man before her marriage. and now she is changed totally and ready to establish her home.  but the man is always conscious towards her old past. why he is love with that women whom he thinks that andhe is liar. in this case the man is untrue towards the lady.
i have full sympathy for kareena as an role in this movie.

beautiful movie. and totally practical. and just look at the casting. ajay devgan , nasserudin shah, vivek oberoi(excels in gangsta roles), saif, konkona, deepak dobriyal and gangs of wasseypur ka sultan and the coy kareena . wonderfully directed. but the mainstream audience might find it boring. i absolutely loved it. better than haider (superb in itself)

aamir khan refused to play the role of langda tyagi. saif proved that he is capable to act in a dark role😎.i have seen shubha maharat, a bengali film where his mother played the antagonist. both are beyond praise. vishal bhardwaj made a masterpiece.

superb...acting speaks a lot. songs, story, dialogs, delivery of dialogues .,. everything is marvellous, excellent...
ajay devgan, saif ali khan, kareena ..everyone are live omakara life. so realistic acting..hats off ...
a must watch movie which can blow ur mind by all factors such as impactful acting , genius direction , hilarious music etc. one of the best indian movie a masterpiece 🙏🙏

the movie is really amazing with strong performance from all the lead actors.
direction is so good that keeps the viewers spell bound till the movie concludes.

must watch for bollywood movie buff.
great... ajay's acting, his expressions, dialogue delivery is excellent. this dark themed movie is a legend. must watch if you want to watch quality movies from bollywood.
exemplary work by visual bhardwaj!!! and kudos to the entire crew and cast. wonderful wonderful movie it was.

the character of langda tyagi played by saif is just phenomenal.deepak dobriyal also did well as usual.perfect adaptation of othello.
